body:
Instead of another script as added in #14607, this adds a simple argument to `spack commands` that updates the completion script.  Developers can now just run:

```console
    $ spack commands --update-completion
```

This should make it simpler for developers to remember to run this *before* the tests fail.  Also, this version tab-completes.
title: commands: add simple `spack commands --update-completion` argument
